title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When attempting to right-click on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, a popup menu should appear that allows the user to add breakpoints/marks. However, in Photon, this menu does not appear.
OB:
1) Open a Java editor. 
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. 
-- Observed Behavior: The expected popup menu to add breakpoints/marks does not appear.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor. 
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler. 
-- Expected Behavior: A popup menu should appear, providing options to add breakpoints/marks. 
3) Verify that the popup menu showing the options is now visible.
